Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning and the New York Yankees outlasted the Kansas City Royals for a 4-3 victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Juan Soto launched a go-ahead homer in the sixth for the Yankees, who increased their AL East lead to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seth Wenig/AP's photo of Jazz Chisholm Jr. celebrating after hitting the walk-off RBI single.
